data.title: Pink Hands Of Hope
data.meta_description: We offer various ways through which you can assist us in raising funds for our services and programs, including making a financial donation, donating thrift store items, volunteering with us, inviting us to speak at an event, hold a fundraising event for us, and choosing PHOH as your charity of choice with the United Way
data.text:
We need volunteers to assist in the Thrift Store, answer program inquiries, attend events to hand out information, and do various other tasks.

â€‹

Be an ENCOURAGER and volunteer with our Pink Angels program. Volunteers write letters of encouragement to patients in treatment.

Do you donate to the United Way through work?

Did you know you can choose Pink Hands of Hope to receive your donations?

We belong to United Way of Capital Region and recently became part of United Way of Southwestern PA. If your company participates in either of those organizations, please remember Pink Hands next time you choose where your money goes.
